description:
When he was a sickly child, Licht was always waiting in his bed for a certain person to visit... While strolling about the city one day, Heine steps inside a charming cafe--and the waiter who greets him is Prince Licht`s spitting image! Is Licht`s secret still safe, or is he in big trouble with the king?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: カフェ・ミッター・マイヤーにて
